Replies.Reply: April 18, 1985      "COMMANDO"
What's that?
On Tuesday?
Shit.
Wait a minute, wait a minute!
I was afraid you'd miss me --
Unnn...sounds like...
.the garbage men.
Maybe they changed the schedule...
Don't worry-we won't.
Where's Sully?
Who're you?
Open the door.
Move out of the way.
Fuck you, asshole.
You ain't seen nothin' yet.
Hear that sound? American workmanship. You think the Japanese invented that? Bullshit We did...sure, we lost it for a while-but we got 'it back.
Sure, get in...comfy, right? I know what you're gonna say...
Go ahead, start it up. Hear that?
Hey!
That's all for me, Les.
Dead...
Tranquilizers.
Why don't you have Bennett do it -- he was there with me.
You trained me, Major.
Sully will make sure you get on the plane and Henriques will stay with you to make sure you get off. If I don't get a call from either one of them, she's dead.
I'll be ready.
Just over two hours.
He'll do anything we tell him as long as he thinks he'll get his daughter back.
GO AHEAD, MATRIX, SHOOT!!
GET OUT OF HERE!!
GET OUT OR I'LL CUT HER FUCKING  THROAT!!
AAAHHH ! 1 He drops the gun on the floor of the boat.
Throw the gun away, Matrix!!
You're dead...
.and so is she.
Fuck you, asshole...
Dad... Dad... put me down.
You don't want to know.
What's wrong?
You said you wouldn't go away again. You said you were through --
Promise?
No way, Jose.
Is it bad?
Then it can't be bad.
Yes...
Yes...
Watching my Dad kick your balls down your throat.
DAD!!
I wanted to shoot...but I couldn't, I just couldn't.
I surrender, I surrender.
When I was a boy and rock and roll came to East Germany, the communists said it was subversive...
.They were right...
I'm not going anywhere.
Promise.
I know.
I better be. You taught me.
You gave them new identities...
We were going to make a normal X life here...
They any good?
I'm not leaving you... if that's what you mean.
How bad you hit?
I've got to get my rifle from the shed. Keep an eye out, they'll be coming. You're downwind, the air currents might tip them off.
I did.
Stay out of sight, I'll be right back.
Where is she?
Wrong.
I thought you were --
I remember the people you tortured and killed.
Why tell me?
He enjoyed the killing a little too much.
And if I don't?
I'll be back, Bennett...
You're a nice guy, Sully, I like you...
.That's why I'll kill you last.
Could I have a blanket and pillow?
It's no problem.
How long is this flight?
I'm airsick...
He looks at the terminal in the distance and begins running toward it.
Don't move.
I'm not going to hurt you.
Do it.
You forgot your keys.
Just do what I tell you and I'll let you go.
You're not gonna make it.
Follow him.
No.
and me.
Out.
Please help me, you're my only X chance! She's got less than ten hours left.
DON'T YOU UNDERSTAND!! THEY'LL X  KILL HER!! HELP ME!!
Matrix anxiously glances at his watch, then looks up toward the bar. Cindy comes out into the doorway where he can see her. She glances behind him, then helplessly looks right at him.
Matrix turns from the guards to point at Cindy in the bar and he suddenly sees Sully approaching her.
NO!!!
I didn't...
You okay?
Where is she, Sully?
I can't hear you, Sully.
Loyalty is touching, Sully, but it's not important in your life right now...
Gravity is very important in your life right now.
I have to warn you, Sully...
This is my weak arm.
Where is she?
But you won't.
Because I already know where.
Remember when I promised to kill you last, Sully?
I lied.
Now I do...
I...let him go.
I'm sorry I got you involved in this.
It's about her.
Some people are using her to force me to do a job.
No. I knew they'd kill her even if I did it. The only chance she has is if I get to her before they know what I'm doing.
She died when Jenny was born.
I was on special assignment.
Or something.
Things you don't want to know about. Things I sometimes wish I didn't know about.
That part of my life is over with. All that matters to me now is Jenny.
What're you doing?
It's Cooke. Let him in...
Fuck you, asshole...
Where is she, Cooke?
Cooke... Cooke!!
Come on!
Try the trunks.
Make any sense to you?
For who -- the airlines?
You sure?
There's a lot of warehouses around Redondo Street. Arius must be keeping a plane there.
Let's go.
Matrix crawls away from the jeeps, moves low through the shadows, goes into a corridor and sees a door ajar.
I saw all the equipment, but there's no plane.
Arius and Bennett aren't here. She's wherever they are.
He studies the coordinates, then picks up a drafting compass and pen. He puts three dots, which corresponds to the three sets of coordinates onto a coasted chart of Southern California.
Matrix uses the compass to draw a second circle.
Something's going on out there.
But it's not here. I saw everything they've got.
How long's it take to fly out to the island?
Not yet.
Shopping.
Come on, come on...
Get the car.
If you'll call Kirby, he'll tell you!!
Where'd you learn to do that?
Don't stop.
What's wrong?
Start paddling.
Come on, you piece of shit!
Works every time...
You know what you're doing?
Why'd you decide to get a pilot's license?
Can you get under the radar?
Try it...
That reminds me of what I'm buying you as soon as we get back.
A new car.
With a cassette deck...
This doesn't involve her, Bennett. It's just between you...and me.
Let her go, Bennett and I'll give you a chance to twist that knife into me.
Just what I thought, Bennett, you're still a yellow chicken-shit.
AAAHHH!
No...
Fuck YOU, asshole...
You know something? I'm glad you couldn't.
This was the last one...
No...
Two might not be enough...
shows Jenny karate moves. She tries a move on him and he pretends she's knocked him over.
gives Jenny a piggyback ride over the bridge that crosses the stream, as they head back to the cabin.
.What's in this?
Kirby approaches the cabin.
John, come on out. It's Kirby.
Silent and smooth...just like always.
I need to talk to your dad, Jenny.
Someone's killing your men.
There must have been a leak.
You've made enemies all over the X world, John. It could be the Syrians, the South Africans, the Russians-or a terrorist group.
They're gonna find you.
You will...I promise. I'm going X into the city to coordinate with the Federal people. In the meantime, Jackson and Harris will stay with you.
Real good...
But not as good as you were.
Any sign of Matrix?
If he's still alive, I'd expect a lot more.
Call the Federal Building. Have them monitor every police, aviation and marine channel in the area.
World War III.
Stop that shelling NOW!
I just saw what's left of Arius' estate... You're the best I've ever known, John... I've saved a place for you if you want to join up with me again.
What about your identities...
I'll make it.
Downwind??
You think I'll smell them coming?

hears a THUMP and sticks her head out from under her bed to look, but sees nothing. Suddenly, footsteps approach her bedroom door. She pulls her head back under the bed just as two boots enter her bedroom.
Mellow out, man. We can't talk business with you waving guns in people's faces.
She's safe, Major. Whether she stays that way.is up to you. My people got some business with you...
.and if you want your kid back, you gotta cooperate.

Matrix ELBOWS him in the stomach, DRIVES his fist into the man's Adam's apple, PULLS HIM DOWN, CRACKS the man's vertebrae, grabs the dead man's rifle and SLAMS the butt against the face on the man closing on him. The man's jaw SHATTERS.
Matrix's motionless body is lying on a slab of a table.
Remember me, Major?
You don't understand a country like Val Verde, Major. It needs a president with an iron hand. It needs my hand again.
Because you're going to return to Val Verde and kill the president you helped to overthrow me.
While Captain Bennett, left, shall we say, under a cloud...
You can get close to Velasquez, you will kill him...We've gone to alot of trouble to find you.
So pretty-There are many things I'm going to teach her.
You kill Velasquez, Major, and you'll get her back. You try anything else...
.and I'll send her to you in pieces.
Your father has just left for Val Verde; he should be back with you soon. Does that make you happy?
Is there anything else that would make you happy?
How soon does Matrix arrive in Val Verde?
Let me know as soon as he lands.
You think he's going to give us any problems?
'I wonder if he knows he's never going to get her back.
No Sir, just those bodies...
.You think there's more?
in Matrix's breast pocket.
Have some beers in Val Verde, Matrix, it'll give everyone more time with your daughter.
It just took off.
Sounds like you need a date.
You know what I could give you?
Jesus Christ...
Fuck you...
FUCK YOU!!
Uhhhh...
You can't kill me, Matrix. You X need me to find your daughter.
I don't know, but Cooke knows. I could take you where I'm supposed to meet him.
Why not?
Yes, Matrix...
Open your mouth again and I'll nail it shut.
First class, seats seven A and B.
You must fasten your seat belt, Sir.
Sure.
Matrix starts down the aisle.
the elevator stops in the service area of the big plane. Matrix gets out of the elevator and looks out a port. The place is moving faster!
The passengers sit unaware of anything unusual.
Jenny is huddled in a darkened cabin below. She wipes the tears from her eyes.
Hi, Lance, it's me!
Cindy. Very funny ...yes, that Cindy. They just cancelled my 7:40 X to Vancouver...
I thought since I'm laid over we could... no, laid over, Lance.
Fuck off, shithead...
Yeah, herpes.
I'm not moving.
That's what they all say.
I have to move to do that.
I've got to give Karate, junitsu, judo, and kung-fu lessons to my students at seven-thirty.
I knew you were going to say that.
Don't get offended by this question, but...
Good.
Can I ask you what this is all about?
and I want to kill you, too.
If you're in a hurry, don't let me hold you up...
Okay, okay. X  X Matrix lets her arm go and she rubs it gingerly.
Take it easy, all right.
There's a huge guy across the way who either honestly needs my help or he's an escaped mental fruitcake.
Don't! d!
WAIT!!!

X You steal my car, rip the seat out, then kidnap me. You make me miss my hair appointment. You beg me to help you and your daughter, which I very kindly do. You get me into a shoot-out where people are getting killed and blood is spurting out all over the place...
Look out!!
How'd you ever get a driver's license?
I think I'm dead.
That's my car, Matrix!!
Now you don't have a car...
Wait a minute...
What'd you do with Sully?
Then why won't you tell me what it's about.
Is she the one that was kidnapped?
Did you do the job?
Is her mother --
Why were you always travelling?
You mean like in the Army or something?
What did you do?
Helping you get her back.
He's in the shower.
Room service...
Coastal is a fuel depot that supplies planes.
No, usually smaller, private aircraft.
I'm getting my pilot's license.
What about your daughter?
Cindy is studying the photos of the aircraft.
One of these plane's an amphibian. Maybe they're using it to fly there.
Let me see that invoice.
Type four fuel is amphibian and two hundred fifty gallons is what it would take to fly that plane to the island and back.
It was refueled at pump station thirty-two, Pacific Pier.
About two hours.
Are we going to the plane?
Where are we going?
How do you get in?
Uh-oh...
High' School.
This isn't a plane... it's a canoe with wings.
Sort of...
My father was an Air Force pilot. That's why I becarle a stewardess. But after a while, I got tired of serving food' and drinks. I wanted to fly the plane myself.
I guess what I've really wanted all along was to be just like h:r:.
They shoot the shit out of this area all the time. The flights out of LAX avoid it like the plague.
Not marine radar, but if we get close enough to the water, the high seas effect might camouflage us.
The car crash.
What?
With a cassette deck?
Coast Guard, this is whiskey, Xray, four, four, eight. Emergency priority message for General Frederick Kirby...
Matrix and Cindy are sitting in her car watching Sully.
My daughter's been kidnapped and he's my only chance of finding her! If he sees me or I lose him, they'll kill her. I need you to follow him; if I get too close, he'll run.
No...
New Wave music PLAYS as valley gals and sharp dudes dance and mingle about. Sully can dig this scene --
Cindy approaches the bar, hesitates, then looks back at Matrix. Across the open space, he nods, urging her forward. She hesitantly moves forward.
Cindy enters the bar, then sees a young security guard, CATES, coming out of the men's room. She moves around a corner so Matrix can't see her and she stops the guard.
Sully moves toward Cindy. at the doorway. Just as he is about to say something to her, he hears a commotion and glances outside.
Sully looks out toward the commotion and suddenly sees Matrix. And Matrix is pointing right at him!
Biggs, you there?
There's a guy up here who may be a wacko. I don't think I can handle him alone.
You'd better stay here, Miss.
Another security guard, BIGGS, a muscular black kid, is flirting with some valley girls and ignoring the constant BEEPING of his walkie-talkie.
.This ain't no Mexican shit, I'm talkin' Maui wowie.
What it is, zitface...
Cool down, puke breath, I'll be right there.
Wanna see me kick some ass?
Attention all units! Emergency on the theater level! Suspect is six-foot-two, brown hair...
.and is one gigantic motherfucker?!
Matrix is getting anxious. He looks at his watch.
Sully is in conversation with the Latin man, unaware of what's going on outside.
Biggs confidently walks along the top level, the girls following. He STOPS abruptly as he sees Matrix, his eyes bulge and he retreats into an alcove and pulls out his walkie-talkie.
Cates and Cindy are still out of Matrix's view.
Sully runs, bumping off of Cindy, and races out onto the top level.
Freeze!!
Thousands of bills come rushing out of the briefcase and begin drifting downward.
The Latin, blood oozing out his stomach and eyes drifting in his head, reaches over the railing to grasp futilely at the money. He reaches too far.
The Latin drops over the third floor railing, falling right through the drifting bills and CRASHES to the floor.

Matrix tries to force open the broken phone booth door to get at Sully, but the bloodied Sully crawls out the other way through a broken window pane, hangs from the railing and drops to the stairwell below.
Who in the hell are you??
I watch you rip a phone booth from the wall and swing from the ceiling like Tarzan...I stop the cops from killing you and then they start chasing me!!
Will you tell me what the hell's going on?
Cindy is looking at her sunbeam, which is smashed to shit, as Matrix approaches.
Matrix pushes open the door slightly to see into the rest of the room. As the door moves, it CREAKS on its hinge.
Matrix starts to move away from the door, then stops.
Matrix desperately grabs the door handle and pushes the door forward.
Matrix sets the width of the legs of the drafting compass, then puts the point of one of the compass legs onto one of the three dots and draws a circle.
CLOSEUP of the pen as it finishes a third circle, the three circles now intersecting right over a small island 200 miles west of Los Angeles.
FOOTSTEPS and CONVERSATION approach the door. Matrix stops drawing and freezes. Cindy looks toward the door. The FOOTSTEPS reach the door, then continue right by it.
Matrix looks at the island, then shows the chart to Cindy.
Cindy glances at Matrix; he's watching the police car.
Two soldiers, ROBERTO and Juan, come down the corridor They pass the room Matrix is in, then Roberto stops.
Momento...
Vega?
He wheels the cart out of the hidden room, moves down the aisle with it, then carefully pushes it so it rolls by itself the rest of the way to Cindy.
Matrix passes by the counter and SUDDENLY A COP comes out from behind the aisle with his shotgun pointed right at Matrix's head. He COCKS the trigger.
FREEZE!!
Daryl looks over at Fred and rolls his eyes. Fred, who's driving, smiles.
Matrix LOOKS HOPELESSLY at his watch.
Hooker, not bad...
I think she wants to give us something.
Matrix, listening to the continuing explosion, reacts.
The guard is TILTING his chair back and forth; Matrix is standing right behind him.
Matrix?
What are you expecting?
Attention, unidentified aircraft.
This is the Coast Guard Cutter ' Mcrgenthal . ' You are f lyinc_ over the San Miguel Naval Gunnery Range.
matrix runs in front of a pair of large gates that lead to the estate.
Matrix is crawling, following a hedge, toward Arius.
Chhhh...
He enters the kitchen, then STOPS COLD. He looks at what's facing him.
Up ahead in the distance, Bennett RACES the jeep toward the dock.
Matrix nears the dock as Bennett tries to start the engines.
Bennett edges the war boat away from the dock, then BLASTS the engines and RACES the boat away...
.just as Matrix reaches the end of the dock.
Suddenly, he hears a NOISE and he looks to the side.
Cindy is RACING her seaplane toward the dock!
Cindy slows the seaplane as she passes the dock and Matrix grabs onto a ladder.
with Matrix hanging onto the ladder, Cindy BLASTS the throttle and RACES after Bennett's boat.
As the seaplane starts to GO FASTER, Matrix holds onto the ladder and looks at Bennett's boat up ahead.
The wind and spray SLAP against Matrix as he watches the seaplane closing the gap on the boat.
Matrix lowers his gun.
Commence target practice...
Bennett and Matrix have their faces pressed to the dirt as a mortar shell EXPLODES near their heads.
Matrix takes his knife out of his wrist sheath and meets Bennett on the sand in front of the boat.
Matrix and Bennett begin to circle each other.
Jenny watches the fight in horror.
Bennett jabs with his knife and SLASHES Matrix, causing a bloody cut.
Jenny, watching the fight, notices Matrix's gun on the beach near her and hesitates to pick it up.
Suddenly Matrix falls backward to the ground, pulling Bennett with him and FLIPS Bennett over him HARD to the sand.
Matrix limps away from the flames, Jenny rushes into his arms and he holds her close. She's crying.
Why not?
